highlights: Developed multi-platform desktop R&D tool to manage device connectivity and data capture, storage, and visualization of clinical trial data

Refactored and denormalized client Redux data store, reducing some page load times in half

Constructed real-time analytics dashboard using Django to provide insights into multibillion-dollar government program
After attending the program, stayed on as part-time instructor and engineer
Facilitated lectures on interview problem solving and interview prep
